examples.example: 我相信通过这次打工的经历，自己能获得更多的成长和进步。

translate.english: I believe that through this part-time job experience, I can gain more growth and progress.

examples.example: 我利用假期去打工，不仅锻炼了自己还收获了快乐和满足。

translate.english: I used the vacation to work part-time, which not only exercised myself but also gained happiness and satisfaction.

examples.example: 我准备利用业余时间去打工，既能增加收入又能积累经验。

translate.english: I am going to take advantage of my spare time to work part-time, which can both increase income and accumulate experience.
